SCTX:
Begin skaalGuardScript

short doOnce
float timer
short nolore

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( doOnce == 0 )
	if ( SkaalAttack == 1 )
		set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	endif
endif

if ( timer < 3 )
	return
endif

if ( doOnce == 0 )
	set doOnce to 1
endif

if ( doOnce == 1 )
	if ( SkaalAttack == 1 )
		ForceGreeting
		set doOnce to 2
	endif
endif



End skaalGuardScript
